argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmelval.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 2 |  | lsmelval.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_subgss | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_subgss | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 7, 9 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( G e. Grp /\ T C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 1, 2 | #P_lsmelvalix | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ T C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) /\ ( X e. T /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) /\ ( X e. T /\ Y e. U ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( T .(+) U ) ) |
